EmailTemplate.subject: Lear 40/45 / Honeywell Primus Elite Upgrade Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOUR FEEDBACK MATTERS! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=valued customer}},
As a Lear 40/45 operator, you are invited to participate in a survey on display and software upgrades Honeywell is considering. Your feedback will help identify the needs and requirements for these upgrades and is essential to ensuring your complete satisfaction.
We greatly value your time and participation! The first 200 operators who complete the survey will receive a $10 Amazon gift card as a token of our appreciation. Gift cards will be emailed to participants who provide their email addresses by November 7, 2017.
The survey should take 20 – 30 minutes or less to complete. Individual responses will be kept confidential. To take the survey, simply click the survey link below:
COMPLETE THE SURVEY <[[https://LearSurvey.sawtoothsoftware.com/login.html]]>
Thank you for your time and feedback.
*Survey eligibility is limited to operators and maintenance personnel of Lear aircraft. Additional terms and conditions apply. Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/PEAFSurveyRules_100517_Final.pdf]]> for full rules and exclusions are available.
